duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist attending physicians in the care and management of patients in various hospital units.
Contribute to decisions for daily care, writing orders, and coordinating tests and procedures.
Perform physical examinations, coordinate lab tests, and diagnostic studies.
Prescribe medications and provide assistance to patients regarding treatment and education.
Make frequent bedside visits to assess patient status and direct care accordingly.
Consult with supervisory physicians to determine the most appropriate care for patients.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in nursing. Must meet requirements set forth by the medical staff office to obtain and retain privileges.
